src_original: laukikīṣu kathāsvanapekṣā viharanti /
tgt_original: 不欣世語，樂在正論，修諸善本，志崇佛道。

src_original: sarvadharmaparyeṣṭikuśalāḥ sarvadharmaprakṛtivyupaśamajñānavihāriṇo 'nupalambhagocarā
tgt_original: 知一切法皆悉寂滅，生身煩惱二餘俱盡。

src_original: niṣkiṃcanā nirupādānā niścintā nirupadhayo 'nupādāya suvimuktā anaṅgaṇā aparyasthāyino  'bhijñāsu amūlasthāyino 'saṅgācārikā anavalīnā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā na saṃsīdanti
tgt_original: 聞甚深法心不疑懼，常能修行其大悲者。 深遠微妙靡不覆載，究竟一乘至于彼岸。

src_original: dūranubodhabuddhajñānapraveśodgatā ekāyanamārgānuprāptā nirvicikitsāstīrṇakathaṃkathā
tgt_original: 決斷疑網，慧由心出，於佛教法該羅無外。

src_original: aparapratyayajñānā anadhimāninaḥ /  sumerusamā jñānābhyudgatāḥ /  candrasūryaprabhātikrāntāḥ prajñābhayā pāṇḍarasuśuklaśuddhaśubhacittatayā ca /  uttaptahemavarṇasadṛśā avabhāsanirbhāsatayā ca /
tgt_original: 智慧如大海、三昧如山王，慧光明淨超踰日月，清白之法具足圓滿。 「猶如雪山，照諸功德等一淨故；

src_original: vasuṃdharāsadṛśāḥ sarvasattvaśubhāśubhakṣamaṇatayā /
tgt_original: 猶如大地，淨穢好惡無異心故；

src_original: apsadṛśāḥ sarvakleśamūlanirdhāvanapravāhaṇatayā ca /  agnirājasadṛśāḥ sarvadharmamanyanākleśanirdahanatayā /
tgt_original: 猶如淨水，洗除塵勞諸垢染故； 猶如火王，燒滅一切煩惱薪故；

src_original: vāyusadṛśāḥ sarvalokāsañjanatayā /
tgt_original: 猶如大風，行諸世界無障閡故；

src_original: ākāśasadṛśāḥ sarvadharmanairvedhikatayā sarvaśo niṣkiṃcanatayā ca /
tgt_original: 猶如虛空，於一切有無所著故；

src_original: (Sukhv, Vaidya 247) padmasadṛśāḥ sarvalokānupaliptatayā /
tgt_original: 猶如蓮華，於諸世間無染污故；

src_original: kālānusārimahāmeghasadṛśā dharmābhigarjanatayā /  mahāvṛṣṭisadṛśā dharmasalilābhipravarṣaṇatayā /  ṛṣabhasadṛśā mahāgaṇābhibhavanatayā /
tgt_original: 猶如大乘，運載群萌出生死故； 猶如重雲，震大法雷覺未覺故； 猶如大雨，雨甘露法潤眾生故；

src_original: nyagrodhadrumarājasadṛśāḥ sarvasattvaparitrāṇatayā /  parvatarājasadṛśāḥ sarvaparapravādyakampanatayā /  gaganasadṛśā aparimāṇamaitrīprabhāvanatayā /  mahābrahmasamāḥ sarvakuśalamūladharmādhipatyapūrvaṃgamatayā /
tgt_original: 如梵天王，於諸善法最上首故； 如尼拘類樹，普覆一切故； 如優曇鉢華，希有難遇故； 如金翅鳥，威伏外道故；

src_original: pakṣisadṛśā asaṃnicayasthānatayā /
tgt_original: 如眾遊禽，無所藏積故；

src_original: garuḍadvijarājasadṛśāḥ sarvaparapravādividhvaṃsanatayā /
tgt_original: 猶如牛王，無能勝故； 猶如象王，善調伏故； 如師子王，無所畏故。

src_original: 25. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tatra buddhakṣetre ye bodhisattvāḥ pratyājātā bhaveyuḥ,  te sarve na nārāyaṇavajrasaṃhatātmabhāvasthāmapratilabdhā bhaveyuḥ,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國中菩薩不得金剛那羅延身者，不取正覺。

src_original: mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //  26. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tatra buddhakṣetre yaḥ kaścitsattvo 'laṃkārasya  varṇaparyantamudgṛhṇīyāt - antaśo divyenāpi cakṣuṣā evaṃvarṇamevaṃvibhūti idaṃ buddhakṣetramiti  nānāvarṇatāṃ jānīyāt,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國中人、天、一切萬物嚴淨光麗，形色殊特，窮微極妙，無能稱量。 其諸眾生乃至逮得天眼，有能明了辨其名數者，不取正覺。

src_original: mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //  27. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tatra buddhakṣetre yaḥ sarvaparīttakuśalamūlo bodhisattvaḥ so 'ntaśo yojanaśatotthitamudāravarṇaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ na saṃjānīyāt,  mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國中菩薩乃至少功德者，不能知見其道場樹無量光色高四百萬里者，不取正覺。

src_original: 28. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tatra buddhakṣetre kasyacitsattvasyoddeśo vā svādhyāyo vā kartavyaḥ syāt,  na te sarve pratisaṃvitprāptā bhaveyuḥ,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國中菩薩若受讀經法，諷誦持說而不得辯才智慧者，不取正覺。

src_original: mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //  29. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya naivaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhavedyatra
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國中菩薩智慧辯才若可限量者，不取正覺。

src_original: samantādaprameyāsaṃkhyeyācintyātulyāparimāṇāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyeran tadyathāpi  nāma parimṛṣṭe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalam,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，國土清淨，皆悉照見十方一切無量無數不可思議諸佛世界，猶如明鏡覩其面像；

src_original: mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: 30. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tatra buddhakṣetre dharaṇītalamupādāya yāvadantarīkṣāddevamanuṣyaviṣayātikrāntasyābhijātasya  dhūpasya tathāgatabodhisattvapūjāpratyarhasya sarvaratnamayāni nānāsurabhigandhaghaṭikāśatasahasrāṇi  sadā nidhūpitānyava na syuḥ,  mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //  31. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya tatra buddhakṣetre na sadābhipravṛṣṭānyeva sugandhinānāratnapuṣpavarṣāṇi sadā pravāditāśca manojñasvarā vādyameghā na syuḥ,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，自地以上至于虛空，宮殿、樓觀、池流、華樹——國土所有一切萬物——皆以無量雜寶百千種香而共合成，嚴飾奇妙超諸人天，其香普薰十方世界，菩薩聞者皆修佛行；

src_original: mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: (Sukhv, Vaidya 229)  32. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya ye sattvā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyācinyātulyeṣu lokadhātuṣvābhayā sphuṭā bhaveyuḥ,  te sarve na devamanuṣyasamatikrāntena sukhena samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，十方無量不可思議諸佛世界眾生之類，蒙我光明觸其體者，身心柔軟超過人天；

src_original: mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //
tgt_original: 若不爾者，不取正覺。

src_original: 33. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya samantādaprameyācintyātulyāparimāṇeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu  bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā tacchravaṇasahagatena kuśalena jātivyativṛttāḥ  santo na dhāraṇīpratilabdhā bhaveyuryāvadbodhimaṇḍaparyantamiti,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，十方無量不可思議諸佛世界眾生之類，聞我名字不得菩薩無生法忍、諸深總持者，不取正覺。

src_original: mā tāvadahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyam //  34. sacenme bhagavan bodhiprāptasya samantādaprameyāsaṃkhyeyācintyātulyāparimāṇeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā pramādaṃ  bodhicittaṃ notpādayeyuḥ,  strībhāvaṃ ca na vijugupseran,  jātivyativṛttāḥ samānāḥ saceddvitīyaṃ strībhāvaṃ pratilabheran,
tgt_original: 「『設我得佛，十方無量不可思議諸佛世界，其有女人聞我名字，歡喜信樂，發菩提心，厭惡女身，壽終之後復為女像者，不取正覺。
